answers.answer: Hello,this is a question for his doctor regarding the medication.However, even more important to prevent further kidney damage is to have excellent control of his blood sugar.If oral meds are not working, insulin can be a very useful medication and give good control.  It is not to be feared.What is his HBA1C.  To prevent kidney damage it would be best if this were lower than the 7, which some doctors consider ok.  Ideally it would be in the 5s.Diet control (low carb works much better than high carb), normalising weight, and daily exercise will all help.Best wishes to you and your husband.
